html:
Together with three of co-authors of the NIR paper, Jason Eshragian, Bernhard Vogginger, and Felix Bauer, we published a hands-on tutorial of the Neuromorphic Intermediate Representation (NIR) on YouTube. We first outline and motivate NIR in a historical context and explain why NIR offers one solution to the problem of interoperability between neuromorphic hardware and software. Felix, Bernhard and I then demonstrate how to use NIR in practice, and Jason concludes with a discussion of the future of NIR and its potential impact on the neuromorphic community.

  • YouTube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A96rInDg8zo
  • Code and demo: https://github.com/Jegp/NIR-demo-repo
